summary.span: 命名空间包含表示 ASCII 和 Unicode 字符编码的类；用于让字符块和字节块相互转换的抽象基类；以及无需创建 的中间实例即可操作并格式化 对象的帮助器类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that represent ASCII and Unicode character encodings; abstract base classes for converting blocks of characters to and from blocks of bytes; and a helper class that manipulates and formats objects without creating intermediate instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码类主要用于不同的编码或代码页与 Unicode 编码之间进行转换。The encoding classes are primarily intended to convert between different encodings or code pages and a Unicode encoding. (Utf-16) 编码.NET Framework 中，在内部使用和编码通常用于存储字符数据以确保跨计算机和区域性的可移植性。 (UTF-16) encoding is used internally by the .NET Framework, and encoding is often used for storing character data to ensure portability across machines and cultures. 类派生自，可以选择回退策略，用于确定如何处理无法转换为字节序列进行编码的字符或转换为字符，不能进行解码的字节数。The classes derived from enable you to choose a fallback strategy, which determines how characters that cannot be encoded into a sequence of bytes, or bytes that cannot be decoded into characters, are handled. 您可以选择以下项之一：You can choose one of the following: - 异常回退。Exception fallback. 您可以选择是通过引发异常数据错误`throwonerror`标志，则可在某些类构造函数中或通过使用和类。You can choose to throw exceptions on data errors either by using a `throwonerror` flag that is available in some class constructors or by using the and classes. 如果您担心的数据流的完整性，建议引发异常。If you are concerned about the integrity of the data stream, throwing on an exception is recommended. - 替换回退。Replacement fallback. 可以使用和类，以无提示方式更改到字符"？"或 Unicode 替换字符 (U + FFFD)。You can use the and classes to silently change a character to "?" or to the Unicode replacement character (U+FFFD). - 最佳回退。Best-fit fallback. 此选项将映射到另一种编码字符的一种编码中的字符。This option maps a character in one encoding to a character in another encoding. 最佳匹配的回退通常不建议，因为它可能会导致数据丢失和混淆，而且比简单"？"字符替换。Best fit fallback is often not recommended because it can cause data loss and confusion, and is slower than simple "?" character replacements. 但是的 ANSI 代码页的最佳的行为是默认值。However, for ANSI code pages the best-fit behavior is the default. 类专用于对单个字符串执行大量操作的操作。The class is designed for operations that perform extensive manipulations on a single string. 与不同类，类是可变的并提供更好的性能串联或删除字符串时。Unlike the class, the class is mutable and provides better performance when concatenating or deleting strings. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) .
